item.title: FAQ
item.description: Which Shells Does Hermit work with? Hermit currently works with ZSH and BASH, but we would welcome contributions to support other shells. Does Hermit Manage Libaries? No, Hermit is deliberately not in the business of installing libraries. Hermit is designed to manage development tools only, not be a general purpose package manager. Consider Nix if you need this kind of functionality. Could Hermit include Python, Ruby? Theoretically yes, but there are several limiting factors:
